survey_name: Adoption and Usage of AI-Powered Personal Finance Management Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the adoption rates, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels of AI-powered personal finance management tools among consumers.

questions.question_text: Are you currently using any AI-powered personal finance management tools?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for a clear binary choice. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
